library(here)

### View the Data
```{r}
glimpse((penguins))
```

### Let's make a plot! 

### This plot will look at the relationship between **bill length** and **bill depth**.
```{r}
penguins %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm)) +
 geom_point(aes(color = species)) +
 scale_color_manual(
 values = c("darkorange", "purple", "cyan4")) 
```
